sentence: These  young  men  and  women  are  having  to  make  split-second  decisions  on  'who  do  I  shoot  or  do  I  not  shoot'  based  on  who  they  find  in  a  room  and  the  threat  that  they  perceive,"  he  said.

These  young  men  and  women  are  having  to  make  split-second  decisions  on  'who  do  I  shoot  or  do  I  not  shoot'  based  on  who  they  find  in  a  room  and  the  threat  that  they  perceive,"  he  said.
